abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33399206, pmid33395337, pmid33399270, pmid33471977, pmid33400390, pmid33476193, pmid33476300, pmid33464224
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.02.02

isBasedOn.name: Physician deaths from COVID-19 have been lower than expected.
WHO recommends corticosteroids for patients with severe or critical COVID-19.
The chronic neuropsychiatric sequelae of COVID-19: The need for a prospective study of viral impact on brain functioning.
Vaccinating Children against Covid-19 - The Lessons of Measles.
Umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells for COVID-19 acute respiratory distress syndrome: A double-blind, phase 1/2a, randomized controlled trial.

Management of patients with severe acute respiratory failure due to SARS-CoV-2 pneumonia with noninvasive ventilatory support outside Intensive Care Unit.
